scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Mark, identified by his halo and the winged lion beside him, who is shown with a beard and long hair, wearing a blue robe over a pink tunic. He is holding an open book with text and appears to be writing or reading. To his right, another book rests on a wooden surface. The background features a patterned tapestry with red and gold motifs, and architectural elements suggesting an interior space with arched openings and wooden paneling. The winged lion, a symbol of Saint Mark, is depicted lying down, looking towards the viewer.
